name: places/ChIJzekHMAhZwokRQlywh4PI1gY
formattedAddress: 128 E 29th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 128 E 29th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Today 12/10/22 I went to this location to send $1200 to my home country, I initially asked how much would it cost to send this amount, the teller (a Latino woman, light skin) replied "20 something", she then said it was $24 dollars but knowing the fact that sending $1000 was only $8 dollars, i changed my mind right there to only send one thousand. However, the teller in a rude manner denied that transaction saying that changes were not allowed (even though I had not paid anything yet). She insisted that I could not change my mind and refused to do the transaction and asked me to leave. Every single time i can to this location, tellers are very rude to customers, particularly my teller. I tried not to come but It was the closest, if you don't want to be treated in a rude manner don't come here!!

originalText.text: I would not recommend going here personally. I made a transaction yesterday of $25 that's it to be sent to my fiance in the Philippines. They gave me a tracking number and took my money. Lo and behold  My fiance never received it and add the tracking number in which they gave me is invalid. I went to the store on 28th street straight and spent hours in the store and went there on 3 different occasions and even had them call customer service to resolve the issue because now my $25 is on hold. This was never offered a refund and now I'm being told my money which I was in control of is now in the resolutions department. I got a lot of answers but none of them was the right answer which was they took my money and now I don't know if I'll ever get it back. It was pushed off to customer service and customer service pushed me off to this facility and in the end I'm out $25. I tried to handle it calmly impatiently to no Avail. I have a tracking number and a receipt and my money is now lost in the resolutions department Christian's department and who knows if I'll ever get it back. All of this for $25. I have now complained to the corporate office the executive complaints office and so on and so forth and I am left no choice but to leave this awful review which I warned them I would do if it wasn't resolved. Western Union can't cancel a transaction and make a new transaction or give me my money back. Really? This is a joke and I am only getting warmed up which which I told them I would do and I am complaining to anyone or any facility or any review which will listen to my complaint until I get the answer I'm looking for. I strongly advise not dealing with this facility. They are not hopeful and did not care.

originalText.text: Great location. Not many western unions around in this neighborhood. Staff was friendly and knowledgable. I only needed to give them my phone # and I was in their system. Made the transaction even smoother. Now I know this location is here . Posted some pics.

originalText.text: Never opens when its suppose to. If ur schedule says open at 9:15am why it 9:25am and there isnt so much as a light on. Smfh horrible. Ppl here should be fired

originalText.text: Girls are great. Very professional and friendly. Stephanie helped me with an issue I had and saved me a lot of time and money.
